page.name: Share state funding data with your adult learners
page.content:
Share the following table from the Additional Resource: A Fifth of American Adults Struggle to Read. Why Are We Failing to Teach Them? with the adult learners you work with. Ask them the following questions to facilitate a discussion about the factors that impact adult literacy in the United States. 

Selected examples of State Funding Statistics on Adult Education Per Eligible Adult: 

  • Connecticut - $149
  • Oregon - $124
  • Vermont - $101
  • Maryland - $18
  • New Jersey - $17
  • South Dakota - $8
  • Nebraska - $2
